text: Wilson Leal Dos Ramos (born 24 February 1983), commonly known as Kilson, is a São Toméan footballer who plays as a midfielder for Sporting Praia Cruz and the São Tomé and Príncipe national team. ==International career== Kilson made his international debut for São Tomé and Príncipe in 2015. ==References== Category:1983 births Category:Living people Category:Association football midfielders Category:São Tomé and Príncipe footballers Category:São Tomé and Príncipe international footballers Category:Sporting Praia Cruz players
title: Kilson (footballer)
